title: Happiest Minds Tech net income up 45% to Rs 52 crore amid high attrition - Business Standard
content: Happiest Minds Tech net income up 45% to Rs 52 crore amid high attrition  Business Standard
description: During the quarter, the mid-sized software firm said, its revenue rose to Rs 310 crore, clipping at 38.8 per cent year-on-year and 6.2 per cent sequentially
